metadata.title: CVE-2023-4771 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A Cross-Site scripting vulnerability has been found in CKSource CKEditoraffecting versions 4.15.1 and earlier. An attacker could send maliciousjavascript code through the /ckeditor/samples/old/ajax.html file andretrieve an authorized user's information.

criterions.comment: ckeditor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
ckeditor3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
ldap-account-manager: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
request-tracker4: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
